definitions.definition: A conditioner product for removing tangles from hair .
A brush used for removing tangles from hair .
A device used with a freestyle BMX bicycle to allow the handlebars to turn 360° without tangling of the brake cables.

main_definition: A conditioner product for removing tangles from hair .
secondary_definitions: A brush used for removing tangles from hair .
( cycling ) A device used with a freestyle BMX bicycle to allow the handlebars to turn 360° without tangling of the brake cables.
